hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: ENABLE_SSLOFFLOAD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: When true, Apache will be configured with the expectation that it is sitting behind an SSL Offload appliance.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [ "$ENABLE_SSLOFFLOAD" = "true" ]; then cp /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts.conf /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts-withssl.conf cp /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts-ssloffload.conf /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts.conf else if [ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts-withssl.conf" ]; then cp /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts-withssl.conf /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts.conf fi fi
